member.summary: Sets or get the output file format.

member.summary: Sets or get the maximum number of quality layers to decode.

member.summary: Sets or get the number of highest resolution levels to be discarded.

member.summary: Sets or get the decoding area left boundary.

member.summary: Sets or get the decoding area right boundary.

member.summary: Sets or get the decoding area up boundary.

member.summary: Sets or get the decoding area bottom boundary.

member.summary: Sets or get the flags.

member.summary: Sets or get whether activates the JPWL correction capabilities for JPWL (wireless applications).

member.summary: Sets or get the expected number of components for JPWL (wireless applications).

member.summary: Sets or get the number of blocks of tile to decode.

member.name: T:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg
member.summary: Provides the methods of OpenJpeg.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.GetVersion
member.summary: Get the string representation of the OpenJpeg version.
member.returns: The string representation of the OpenJpeg version.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.StreamCreateDefaultFileStream(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a stream from a file identified with its filename with default parameters.
member.param: The filename of the file to input to stream.
The value whether the stream is a read stream.
member.exception: The specified path does not exist.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.CreateDecompress(OpenJpegDotNet.CodecFormat)
member.summary: Creates a J2K/JP2 decompression structure.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.Decode(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream,OpenJpegDotNet.Image)
member.summary: Decode an image from a JPEG 2000 codestream.
member.param: The image that receives decoded datum.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.EndDecompress(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Stream)
member.summary: Read after the codestream if necessary.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.ReadHeader(OpenJpegDotNet.Stream,OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Image@)
member.summary: Decodes an image header.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the read from stream. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if the main header of the codestream and the JP2 header is correctly read; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetDecodeArea(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.Image,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Sets the given area to be decoded.
member.param: The left position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The top position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The right position of the rectangle to decode in image.
The bottom position of the rectangle to decode in image.
member.returns: true if the area is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetDefaultDecoderParameters(OpenJpegDotNet.DecompressionParameters)
member.summary: Set decoding parameters to default values.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.SetupDecoder(OpenJpegDotNet.Codec,OpenJpegDotNet.DecompressionParameters)
member.summary: Setup the decoder with decompression parameters provided by the user and with the message handler provided by the user.
member.returns: true if the decoder is correctly set; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.CreateCompress(OpenJpegDotNet.CodecFormat)
member.summary: Creates a J2K/JP2 compression structure.

member.name: M:OpenJpegDotNet.OpenJpeg.GetNativeVersion
member.summary: Get the string representation of the version of wrapper library of OpenJpeg.
member.returns: The string representation of the version of wrapper library of OpenJpeg.
